4306460.name: Endless TD
4306460.description:
Endless TD

Endless TD is an online co-op tower defense built for “one more wave” energy.

Team up with up to 4 players, create outrageous tower combinations, and see how long your squad can survive as waves scale into the absurd.

Or go head-to-head.

Engage in 1v1 or 2v2 PvP battles, where you’re not just defending — you’re sending waves of enemies to overwhelm your opponents. Balance offense and defense, drain their lives to zero, and prove your build is superior.

No Two Runs Feel the Same

• 8 distinct biomes — desert, jungle, lava, graveyard, toxic swamp, winter environments, and more

• Choose your battlefield:

✔ 1-Lane Mode — a long, escalating survival marathon
✔ Split Mode — multiple routes, exits, and pressure points

• Dynamic weather systems reshape combat:

Rain, blizzards, sandstorms, toxic storms, volcanic ash, and more

• Environmental hazards:

✔ Lightning strikes
✔ Storm scaling
✔ Elemental damage events

• Shield Barrier System — protect your defenses from environmental chaos

• Optional Boss Attacks Towers Mode — wave bosses actively target your towers for an added challenge

Buildcraft Is the Game

Harness 9 damage types:

Physical • Fire • Ice • Lightning • Poison • Arcane • Unholy • Light • Water

Exploit enemy resistances, stack devastating status effects, and design scaling defenses built for deep runs.

Then push things further:

✔ Merge towers into powerful hybrids like Siege Titan, Frost Mage, Death Ray, and more
✔ Upgrade merged towers through 3-Star Evolutions
✔ Unlock the Transcendence System for extreme late-game scaling
✔ Construct outrageous defenses designed for endless progression

Archetypes + Talents = Deep Customization

Choose your Archetype:

Marksman • Elementalist • Warlord • Tactician • Alchemist • Ascendant

Spend Talent Points across layered progression systems across 150+ talents:

✔ Core Roles — Offense / Controller / Support
✔ Elemental Branches — Inferno / Frost / Storm / Plague
✔ Tower Mastery
✔ Fusion Mastery and more!

Unlock powerful Keystones that redefine your strategy.

Every run becomes a new build puzzle.

Competitive PvP & Rankings

✔ Two-Tier PvP Ranking System
✔ Separate ranks for 1v1 & 2v2
✔ Climb from win-based progression into competitive tiers
✔ Unlock exclusive banners & frames

Adapt your builds. Counter your opponents. Climb the ladder.

Play Your Way

✔ Co-op or PvP
✔ Chill survival runs or cutthroat competition
✔ Shared or individual gold systems

Gold Distribution Options:

• Last Hit
• Split
• Everyone Gets Full

✔ Optional Boss Attack Modes
✔ AI teammates or opponents

Your lobby. Your rules.

Climb the Leaderboards

Push for the highest wave.

Track solo records or dominate as a squad.

Bragging rights await.

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
